project(mbed-classic)


# include root directories of all components we depend on (directly and
# indirectly, including ourself)
include_directories("C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic")


# recurse into dependencies that aren't built elsewhere



# And others (typically CMSIS implementations) need to export non-system header
# files. Please don't use this facility. Please. It's much, much better to fix
# implementations that import these headers to import them using the full path.
include_directories("C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/api")
include_directories("C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/hal")
include_directories("C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/targets/hal")
include_directories("C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic/targets/cmsis")


# modules with custom CMake build systems may append to the
# YOTTA_GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS property to add compile-time-determined include
# directories:
get_property(GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS GLOBAL PROPERTY YOTTA_GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS)
include_directories(${GLOBAL_INCLUDE_DIRS})

# Provide the version of the component being built, in case components want to
# embed this into compiled libraries
# !!! WARNING: use of this is deprecated, please use the
# YOTTA_<MODNAME>_VERSION_STRING / _MAJOR / _MINOR / _PATCH definitions instead
set(YOTTA_COMPONENT_VERSION "0.0.4")
add_definitions(-DYOTTA_COMPONENT_VERSION="0.0.4")

# Provide versions of all the components we depend on, the corresponding
# preprocessor definitions are generated in yotta_config.h
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_STRING "0.0.4")
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_MAJOR 0)
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_MINOR 0)
set(YOTTA_MBED_CLASSIC_VERSION_PATCH 4)

# delegate to an existing CMakeLists.txt:
add_subdirectory(
    "C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/yotta_modules/mbed-classic"
    "C:/Users/jossla01/Documents/GitHub/BLE_iBeacon/BHRM/build/mkit-classic-gcc/ym/mbed-classic/existing"
